response.overview: Set in the 1990s and inspired by 'The Last Picture Show,' this 35-minute short from director Ren√© Pereyra tells the story of a queer nightclub that is on the brink of disappearing. Part drama, part dark comedy, the film takes place in a small, turbulent Mexican town full of insecure men and tells a poignant story about homophobia and machismo posturing that conceals a burgeoning homosexuality.
response.title: The Blue Angel
